channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Being Polite Or Rude To AI Shapes Your Mental Health Chat Advice In Unexpected Ways
item.description: An ongoing topic is whether being polite versus rude to AI gets you differing responses. I explore this within the realm of mental health chats. An AI...

item.title: Ro CEO wants to erase GLP-1 stigma with first Super Bowl ad featuring Serena Williams
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Crypto crime-fighting startup TRM Labs notches $1 billion valuation with new $70 million funding round
item.description: With its blockchain analytics tools, TRM Labs helps private companies and agencies like the FBI track illicit finance.

item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp says Trump has a point about the AI race: ‘there’s a real hesitance to adopt these kind of products in the West’
item.description: Alex Karp said he sees a real "lack of adoption in Canada, Northern Europe, and in Europe in general." It's terrible news for politics, he added.

item.title: Recap: ‘Fallout’ Season 2 Finale Episode – ‘The Strip’
item.description: Prime Video released its eighth and final episode of "Fallout" Season 2 on Tuesday, which answers some burning questions and sets the stage for what i...

item.title: The Journey Alti Wireless Charging Desk Mat Could Be The Key To An Uncluttered Desk
item.description: If you haven’t used a desk mat yet, then this new one from Journey might persuade you to. The reversible Journey Alti desk mat has a built-in wireless...

item.title: Sam Altman On Elon Musk, Donald Trump, Robotics, Fatherhood And More
item.description: Across two wide-ranging interviews with Forbes, Altman covered more ground than could fit in our profile. Here are his remarks on everything from vacc...

item.title: Nevada legislators blast Boring Company over safety and environmental violations as Elon Musk-owned startup declines to testify in hearing
item.description: Elon Musk's tunneling startup said it was “unable to attend” the four-hour hearing in Las Vegas about violations it has racked up since 2022.

item.title: Revolut’s De Novo Bet: How The Fintech Giant Plans To Build A US Bank
item.description: Fintech giant Revolut is ditching acquisitions to build a bank from scratch. Here is how the de novo process works and what it means for consumers.

item.title: See the market where volatility is rising along with stocks
Gold's back above $5,000 an ounce. Silver is surging, too.
Do gold and silver belong in my retirement portfolio after their dramatic falls?
China moves to ban feature commonly seen on Tesla vehicles over fear of trapped passengers
item.description: China bans electronic door handles starting 2027, requiring mechanical releases after safety incidents left passengers trapped inside vehicles.

item.title: Fed's Miran maintains call for aggressive interest rate cuts this year
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran is calling for aggressive interest rate cuts exceeding one percentage point after dissenting in the latest FOMC...

item.title: Energy giant bets big on US, says its electricity market 'hottest' in the world
item.description: Siemens Energy announced a $1 billion investment to expand U.S. grid equipment and turbine production, citing surging power demand driven by artificia...

item.title: Amazon AWS CEO Matt Garman pushes back against Elon Musk’s space data centers plan
item.description: The head of Amazon's cloud business says major obstacles need to be overcome before space-based data centers are a reality.

item.title: These 2 charts show why buying a house is the hardest it’s been in decades
Super Micro logs record revenue from AI demand, and the stock surges
Here's when taxpayers will get their refunds
item.description: The IRS typically processes tax refunds within 21 days for e-filed returns, while mailed returns take six weeks or more to process during the 2025 tax...

item.title: Government shutdown will delay release of January jobs report
item.description: The partial government shutdown that began over the weekend will delay the release of the January jobs report slated for release on Friday.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
